content: Hello dear Forum users.  Â Â  I started creating channels, blogging. Now, just to attract people's attention, I want to make a contest for $50. comments.author: CryptoHeadlineNews
comments.body: Quote from: RikandMorty1 on July 25, 2023, 11:33:52 AMWhere on earth are you located Â  ? Still around 12 hours to midnight.LolzðŸ¤£ðŸ¤£... I'm still wondering who might have been your Mathematics teacher for you to say 00:00 hours still have few hours to go when 00:00 passed since 15hours ago.Come, here is a brief explanation shown belowWhen you enter a new day, that is considered as 00:00 hours, and it's after then clock moves towards 1a.m, 2a.m and e.t.c Here is the hierarchy as shown below.New day starts from..00:00 01:00a.m02:00a.m03:00a.m04:00a.m05:00a.m06:00a.m07:00a.m08:00a.m09:00a.m10:00a.m11:00a.m12:00 noon13:00p.m14:00p.m15:00p.m16:00p.m17:00p.m18:00p.m19:00p.m20:00p.m21:00p.m22:00p.m23:00p.m24:00p.mAnd the day ends for a new day to begin.

Still around 12 hours to midnight.LolzðŸ¤£ðŸ¤£... I'm still wondering who might have been your Mathematics teacher for you to say 00:00 hours still have few hours to go when 00:00 passed since 15hours ago.Come, here is a brief explanation shown belowWhen you enter a new day, that is considered as 00:00 hours, and it's after then clock moves towards 1a.m, 2a.m and e.t.c Here is the hierarchy as shown below.New day starts from..00:00 01:00a.m02:00a.m03:00a.m04:00a.m05:00a.m06:00a.m07:00a.m08:00a.m09:00a.m10:00a.m11:00a.m12:00 noon13:00p.m14:00p.m15:00p.m16:00p.m17:00p.m18:00p.m19:00p.m20:00p.m21:00p.m22:00p.m23:00p.m24:00p.mAnd the day ends for a new day to begin.No need to start throwing insults. I was thinking that OP might have meant the end of the 25th rather than the start, because it wouldn't make sense to announce the winner just two hours after the submission deadline QuoteI am looking at the application until 2023.07.24 10:00 UTC+0But I'm also skeptical about this. Let's see if OP ever shows up again.
